name: St. John & Partners
description: St. John & Partners is a full-service agency headquartered in Jacksonville since 1984.  SJ&P has been home to a quality of life and a quality of work that has helped attract great people and build one of the region’s largest independent agencies. Today, there are 115 who call SJ&P home and who have helped us grow 40% over the past three years.  We encourage you to take a closer look at what they, and the clients who have fueled that growth, already know.
